defines.label: Unspecified
defines.comment: A section that is unknown or otherwise unspecified.

defines.label: Abstract
defines.comment: A brief summary of a book, a research article, thesis, review, conference proceeding or any in-depth analysis of a particular subject or discipline, the purpose of which is to help the reader quickly ascertain the publication's purpose.

defines.label: Introduction
defines.comment: An initial description which states the purpose and goals of the following writing, and, in the case of journal articles, typically includes background information on the research topic and a review of related work in the area.

defines.label: Materials and Methods
defines.comment: A description in a research paper documenting the specialized materials and/or methods used in the work described. This description is contained in a section often entitled 'Methods and Materials', 'Experimental' or a related term.

defines.label: Results
defines.comment: The report of the specific findings of an investigation, given without discussion or conclusion being drawn.

defines.label: Discussion
defines.comment: An interpretation and discussion of the results obtained and an analysis of their significance, in support of conclusions. These conclusions may be part of this discussion or may be included in a separate section of the document.

defines.label: Conclusion
defines.comment: A reflection on the preceding text, summarizing the evidence, arguments or premises presented in the document and their logical outcomes. Conclusions are a fundamental feature in academic research publications, and may be included in the Discussion section.

defines.label: Acknowledgements
defines.comment: Usually part of the preface, or a separate section in its own right, often as part of the back matter, it acknowledges those, including funding agencies, who contributed to the undertaking of a research project described in a publication, or to the creation of the work in some way. In scientific articles, the acknowledgements are usually placed as a separated section immediately following the Discussion or Conclusions.

defines.label: References
defines.comment: A list of items each representing a reference to a specific part of the same document, or to another publication.

defines.label: Reference
defines.comment: A reference to a specific part of the document, or to another publication.

defines.label: Footnotes
defines.comment: A list of items each representing a footnote.

defines.label: Footnote
defines.comment: A structural item that allows the author to make an additional remark, usually outside the main body of the text.

defines.label: Formula
defines.comment: A unit of information expressed in mathematical, chemical or logical symbols and language.

defines.label: Formula Object
defines.comment: A formula object embedded in a web page

defines.label: Image
defines.comment: An image resource

defines.label: Video
defines.comment: A video resource

defines.label: Audio
defines.comment: An audio resource

defines.label: Table
defines.comment: A table resource (set of data arranged in cells within rows and columns)

defines.label: Table Object
defines.comment: A table object embedded in a web page

defines.label: Document Object
defines.comment: The most generic type for creative work encodings that are documents (HTML, LaTEX, DOCX, etc.)

defines.label: checksum
defines.comment: A small-size datum from an arbitrary block of digital data for the purpose of detecting errors which may have been introduced during its transmission or storage.
The checksum of the resource.
defines.label: checksum

defines.comment: Name of the algorithm used to compute the checksum value. Examples might include MD5, SHA-1 etc.
defines.label: checksum algorithm

defines.comment: The actual value of the hash in base64 if no datatype are present.
defines.label: hash value
